title: Pixel 4XL returned from Google maintenance and now sounds won't work
content:
I sent my phone to Google unfer warrenty to fix the scr3that wasn't working. They replaced the mother board, add sent it back, but they didn't check it was working and now the buttom speakers doesn't work at all!

What can I do? 
The phone is useless now.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
